'''''Lightning-Riding Adventurer (I)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated [[Time Trial Challenge]]s on [[Narukami Island]], [[Kannazuka]], and [[Yashiori Island]] in Inazuma.
